Soul swiftly jumped to his feet, taking stock of the room around him. What would be the best plan of action?
131.title: Watch Your Mouth

choices: You glance down and see a few bugs crawling up your pants.
Black Star punches you, getting your attention.
You stand up and leave your room, unknowingly bringing along a few passengers.
134.content:
Soul Eater Evans woke up to the bright light of your bedroom light. His crimson eyes fluttered open as he adjusted to the unusually bright light he was staring at. Once his eyes had adjusted, he noticed the ceiling of the room he was in. It wasn’t the color of HIS bedroom ceiling and he never remembered it being so high up. Puzzled, the albino weapon sat up and glanced around. His eye widened in shock as he noticed how everything was huge.

‘What the hell is going on?!” shouted a teen, but not Soul himself. Soul looked next to him and saw none other than Black Star standing there. The meister looked around and suddenly noticed Soul sitting next to him. “Whoa, Soul?! What are you doing here?”

“Hell if I know.” Soul replied as he stood up and put his hand sin his pockets. “One minute I’m taking a nap and the next I’m here. You?”

“Same thing. I just finished a workout and laid down for a minute.”

“My story is also similar.” came a third voice, who Soul and Black Star recognized as Death the Kid’s. The suited young man appeared next to them, looking equally confused.

“You too? Man…” Soul scratched his head as he tried to figure out what the heck was going on.

“I take it nether of you have anything to do with this?” Death’s son asked, glaring at the two males a sif they were the culprits.

“Heck no! If it was us, why would we shrink ourselves?” Black Star shouted.

“Because your…ahh, forget it.” Kid glanced around the room again. “Whoever did do this has horrible taste. This room isn’t symmetrical at all!”

“I’m going to find whoever did this and give them a piece of my mind!” the blue haired teen said as he clenched his fist and took off without another word.

“Hey! Where are you going?!” Soul yelled after his friend, but he didn’t stop.

“Just leave him.” Kid said as he started to walk forward. “Lets try and find any clues that can tell us where we are.”

“Who made you boss?” Soul muttered under his breath as he followed Kid. The two walked across your carpet until they came to a large structure; your couch. As Soul approached it, he accidentally tripped over something and fell flat on his face.

“Arg, damn it!!” Soul cursed as he got back to his feet. “Well…this isn’t a dream.”

“I could of told you that. Try to watch where you’re going so you don’t trip over…” Kid looked at what Soul had tripped on and was suddenly suppressing his laughter. Soul looked at him confused until he looked down and saw that he was standing in some kind of fabric. It suddenly dawned on him that it was a pair of boxers you had left on the floor.

“Oh god! Not cool!” Soul cried as he jumped off the boxers. Kid would of erupted into laughter at this point if a sudden booming noise hadn’t distracted him. Soul and Kid were both startled by this booming sound as it got closer and closer. The ground under their feet started to vibrate and they watched as your gigantic form appeared beyond the couch. How the heck had they not seen you?!

“Holy crap…” Soul muttered as he gazed up at your towering form. Both boys were in such awe of your size that they probably would have been crushed if you got any closer. Thankfully, you stopped right in front of them and seated yourself on the couch. Soul and Kid watched as you grabbed the TV remote and pointed it at the screen.

“I hope it still works.” you say as you click on the TV and start flipping through the channels, making sure they were all coming in clearly.

“Hey, Soul, wasn’t Black Star running in the same direction this giant came from?” Kid asked.

“You’re right!” Soul exclaimed as he look at your gigantic sneakers. What if you had stepped on him?

“Hey guys! Up here!” Black Star shouts, earning his two friends’ attention. Soul and Kid looked up to see the muscular meister standing on top of your shoe. You were completely oblivious to the tiny Black Star.

“Black Star? What are you doing up there?” Kid asks. Black Star merely folds his arms over his chest and laughs.

“I found this guy and knew right away he was the one who did this to us! I’m going show him why I’m the BIG guy, even when shrunken!” Black Star answered. Before either of the two boys could shout back, Black Star started climbing up your pants leg.

“Damn him!” Kid cursed as he ran over to your shoe and jumped on top of it.

“You guys are going to get yourself killed!” Soul shouted at his two friends, but they weren’t listening. The red eyed weapon stood there for a moment before breathing a heavy sigh and following Kid. As you flipped through the channels on your television, you had no idea there were two meisters and a weapon in the room with you…and climbing you to boot!

1341.content:
Unfortunately for the the two miesters and the weapon (who had gotten past your shoe and began to scale your pants now), you just happened to drop the remote. "Damn." You sigh as you reach down to pick it up, that's when you notice three unusually large bugs crawling up your jeans.



Luckily for the boys they were in good shape and used to physically demanding tasks such as this, so they didn't tire easily. However when the large remote clattered to the floor below them and they saw you leaning down to them to get it, they froze.

"Don't move!!" Kid yelled.

That was when your eyes locked onto them, they couldn't tell from your expression whether or not you were going to brush them off as bugs or not, either way they were-"Black Star NO!!!" Kid and Soul screamed at the same time when Black Star jumped straight toward your face! "AAAAAAARGH!!!" He yelled out as he flew through the air and came to rest on the tip of your nose.

"Gah!!" You yelp in surprise when Black Star lands on your nose and begins to attack. "Ow!!" You yell out in pain.

"Idiot!!" Soul yelled as he and Kid held on for dear life as Black Star's attacks surprised you and caused you to jump.

You angrily pluck the bug off the tip of your nose and flick it across the room. Black Star was knocked unconscious by the force of it and ends up sailing somewhere onto the sea of carpet.

You look down at your pants and see the other two bugs....
1341.title: Brave Bug

choices: The door behind Black Star suddenly opens.
Black Star reaches the couch after several minutes.
13411.content:
Your stare turns into a glare as you spot the two bugs clinging to your pants. Was your room infested now? Did these bugs think they could just crawl on top of you. The two teens could only watch was you bent down and brushed them off your pants. They were helpless against your gigantic hands and were easily swept off the fabric toward the carpet. Luckily, the force wasn’t as bad as when Black Star had been flicked, so they were still conscious hen they hit the floor. Soul groaned as he rubbed the back of his head and looked up.

“Oh, geez…”

You glaring down at him with a look of annoyance. Soul didn’t like that look at all; it’s as if you were looking at him like he wasn’t a human being at all, but something less.

“Does he think we’re bugs or something? Do I look like a bug?! Bugs are not cool, like I am!” Soul says, but you’re not trying to hear him so none of his words reach your ears. However, his question was still answered.

“Damn bugs. I’m going to have to scrape you off my shoes now…” you say, your voice sending chills down Soul’s spine. Before you can even raise your foot, however, your attention turns to the TV. “Holy crap! I didn’t know this was on now!”

Soul watches as you forget about him completely and sit back down on the couch. Your attention is glued to the flickering lights of the screen and for now it seems like he’s in the clear. The white haired weapon breaths a sigh of relief and gets to his feet.

“That was a close one, eh Kid?” he asks, but gets no response. He quickly take takes a look around, but cannot find the snappy dresser anywhere. “Shit, he must of fallen somewhere else!” The sharp toothed teen ruffles his hair before choosing a direction and begins walking. This room was gigantic and there was a giant who thought he was a bug in it. How was he supposed to survive, let alone find his friends?

***

“Ugh…that was unenjoyable.” Kid muttered as he got to his feet with a little effort. A quick glance around showed him that Soul was nowhere in sight. His situation just got worse and worse. As he tried to think how it could get any more worse, your foot suddenly stomped down next to him. The Shinigami jumped back in fright and looked up at your seated form. “I can’t believe how big he is. At that size, he might even be stronger than father!”

Kid knew being around you was dangerous. He had seen what you did to Black Star. One of the strongest guys he knew…merely flicked aside like a bug! If he spent too much time near your feet, he might end up under them!

“I need to think this over again…and do it anywhere but here.” Kid told himself as he carefully walked around your feet. You didn’t notice him at all, since your eyes were glued to the TV. Perhaps that was a good thing, since the first thing you would probably do if you saw a pesky bug skittering around your feet would be to stomp it…

***

On the other side of the room, near the door, Black Star was laying unconscious on the floor. Someone as tough as him wouldn’t be out for long, though, as the blue haired meister quickly regained consciousness and sat up in full alert.

“What? How’d I get over here?!” he shouts as he looks around, puzzled. His eyes fall upon you, sitting on your couch like nothing had just happened. The muscular ninja’s face twists into one of anger as he hops to his feet. Everything was coming back to him now. “That bastard! How dare he flick me! I’m the guy who will surpass God! This time I’ll defiantly clobber you!” Black Star speeds off at max speed toward the couch. However, at his small size, his fastest seemed like a crawl to the average person. It would take him awhile to trek across your room.

Ash wakes up with a pounding head ache. Pounding!

He groans as he tries to stand, but only falls back onto his butt.

choices: He Can't Stop Readjusting His Balls
He Can't Stop Picking His Wedgie
Ash Is Missing In Some Scenes
15212.content:
"I really should finish that one anime," you say to yourself.

Ash, standing in the middle of your room, is shocked to see you, to say the least.

"Whooooooah!" he shouts as he beholds your gigantic (5'5") size.

"Holy magikarp!" he screams as you begin to stomp towards him. Well, your computer.

He runs away from you, towards your computer, but your sneaker'd feet easily catch up to him. Your left foot slams down, mere inches away from his shrunken body. The massive impact sends him flying into a pile of clothing, which he pathetically sinks into.

You boot up your most prized possession, and take a seat, ready to catch the final episodes.

Ash sinks further, and further into the mass of fibers. He finds what appears to be a network of tunnels in the pile of clothing.

"Huh, wonder where this leads to?" the boy asks himself. "Maybe to the way out if I'm lucky!"

Ash crawls through the tunnel, until he hits a seemingly dead end room. The room is round, a little musky smelling, but it's really beautiful. The cotton walls are printed with the pattern of a beautiful purple, and gold galaxy.

"Wow," Ash says, completely amazed.

Just as you begin to hit play, there's a sudden knock at your door, and it swings open to reveal one of your very many brothers, Adam. You mean... Ugh, Satoshi.

Adam has the very blessed ability to appear normal, having good looks, the ability and passion to play basketball, and pretty good social etiquette, but he negates alllll of that with his cringey, weeby love for anime. Especially for Pokemon. He loves Pokemon to such an extent that he refuses to answer to Adam, and must be addressed as Satoshi. But you never do. Despite all his cringe, though, he happens to be one of your many best friends, easily because of how close in age the two of you are. You wish you could say that about Tommy.

I mean. You like Pokemon, too, but not like Adam does. It's so easy to get under his skin, too. Referring to the main character as Ash instead of Satoshi. Calling every Pokemon Pikachu. Except Pikachu. And of course calling it Pokemans. Gosh. Well, you love him anyways. But...

"Adam, why are you naked?!" You ask, averting your gaze.

"I'm not naked, I have a T-Shirt on!" he argues.

"I can see your junk!" You retort.

"Yeah, actually, I can't find my favorite underwear," he says as he enters your room, and begins rifling through the pile of clothing by your chair.

"You have a favorite pair of underwear?" You ask incredulously, turning to him, only to turn away once again after catching a glimpse of blindingly white butt cheeks.

"You don't?" he asks.

"No," you say, shaking your head.

"Found 'em!" he says, and you turn to see him triumphantly holding a pair of custom galaxy print Bjorn Borg boxer briefs.

"Oh, great, oh, fuck!" You say as you shield your eyes from the unsightly thing hanging between his legs.

Adam puts on his underwear, which hug is bulge, and dip into his butt crack, showing off each cheek. He pulls at the wedgie, and readjusts his crotch, getting comfortable.

"Hey, do you want to watch Pokemon?" he asks, still picking at his wedgie, and his bulge.

"You mean Pokemans?" you ask, and you laugh as he starts to go off.

You go to your TV, and put on a Pokemon VHS tape before sitting on your bed.

"I'll be right back!" Adam says, and he runs out the room, before returning with the star of the show, a custom made Satoshi plushie. He settles in on the bed, wiggling his hips to rub an itch in his butt, and readjusting his bulge once again.

"Wouldn't it be so cool to meet Satoshi?" he coos, unaware that his hero, idol, and lifelong obsession is struggling to survive beneath the immense weight of his smelly, titanic teenage number one fan.

info.brief_description: What happens when an anime guy is shrunken and transported...to YOUR world?
info.description:
Most anime shrinking stories follow a usual formula. Someone from the real world is shrunken and transported to an anime world. They must then survive the gigantic world populated by giant anime characters.

However, what if the opposite happened? What if an anime character is shrunken and transported right into your room? What would they do in the new, giant world? What would YOU do if you found them?

~Rules~

1. This is a m/m story only. If you want a giantess or SW story, go somewhere else please.
2. Only anime characters can shrink and they cannot grow (unless they are somehow being returned to normal size).
3. No one line chapters unless it's a choice chapter.
4. Any type of interaction is allowed. You may do whatever you want with the tiny anime characters. Their fates are in your hands...
5. The shrunken characters are not invincible.
6. Other than yourself, you may introduce other characters. They could be your brother(s), your friend(s), or other acquaintances.
7. Do not spam the story.
8. Please add and have fun!
